content: junimos from stardew valley pattern by tollow @madebytollow contact ravelry tollow instagram @madebytollow e-mail jonatan tollow@icloud com introduction hey y all this is my first ever crochet pattern so bear with me i fell in love with these tiny creatures named junimos from the game stardew valley i have recently made several more complex amigurumis and felt the need for a simpler one and therefore i came up with this pattern i hope you think they are as cute as i do happy crocheting yarn & needle i used a cotton 8/4 yarn 50g/170m and a 2 5 mm crochet hook yarn consumption is very low and i didn t measure it you can use any yarn you like but remember to switch the needle size depending on the yarn other useful materials filling e g polyester or cotton tapestry needle stich marker always helpful finished size 5x4x4 cm pattern head ball 1 6sc in magic loop in a fun colour 2 increase x6 12 3 decrease x6 6 4 cut and fasten_off yarn now take a thread of black yarn 10cm and fasten it on the inside of the ball for e g tie it with the first piece of loose yarn from the magic loop and let it fall out use a tapestry needle and close the ball with the coloured yarn by sewing in all the remaining 6 stiches i go from inside-out on all the outer loops this makes a tidy ring fasten and cut you should now have a coloured ball with a black string attached body 1 6sc in magic loop in same colour as above 2 increase x6 12 3 1sc increase x6 18 4 2sc increase x6 24 5 3sc increase x6 30 6 in back loop only 4sc increase x6 36 continue in both loops 7-13 single_crochet in all stiches 36 now before we start decreasing take the head ball and pull the black yarn though the top of the head from outside to in and fasten the yarn leaving a tail approx 1 5cm 14 4sc decrease x6 30 15 3sc decrease x6 24 16 2sc decrease x6 18 fill the body and continue you can also add the eyes and cheeks now if you d like see below 17 1sc decrease x6 12 18 decease x 6 6 fasten of leaving a long tail stich the last 6 stiches and tighten now without cutting the yarn pull the yarn with the tapestry needle right thought the entire body to the top of the head pull gauge and go trough to the bottom again this will create the apple shape and avoid it being only a round ball fasten add the eyes on row 10 cheeks between row 11 and 12 you can also add other facial features if you want with a
